page.title: 17MINTERBURN SCHOOL
page.content: We have many school traditions; the classes take turns, providing a morning assembly,we have a concert each Christmas term,each June we have a sports day,and at the end of June the children who are leaving this school entertain us.One year the teachers decided to entertain! We have an active parents teachers association.This year the comittee organised a fashion show and a sale, which raised enough money to finance a new reading scheme. Last year we had a school trip to Edinburgh, which was enjoyed by all participating.This year we had hoped to journey to London, but we could not raise a sufficient number.We are going to have a picnic in Tannaghmore Gardens instead! We hope the school at Minterburn will continue for many years.
